Comment: It has been but it’s been acutely exacerbated by Trump and republicans. In 2017 trump and republicans shut down the government right in the middle of the FAA trying to implement a plan to increase hiring. The shutdown led to the FAA missing its hiring targets every single year of the Trump admin and [staffing reached an all time low under his presidency.](https://imgur.com/a/y1MpGnX) And to put a finer point on it, [the shutdown ended when airports shut down because of low staffing in towers](https://www.Ann.com/2019/02/06/politics/ten-air-traffic-controllers-shutdown?cid=ios_app)  Then Biden became president and his administration [exceeded their hiring targets every single year he was president](https://imgur.com/a/1ibyc4V) and staffing increased every year. Now all of a sudden, Trump comes back and DOGE starts furlowing government workers, including ATCs and lo and behold, there’s a crisis again and plans are crashing.
